title: OTA no-shows to minicamp holdouts? Intel on key players who skipped offseason work
content: Several key players, such as Haason Reddick and T.J. Watt, missed OTAs, but this week's camp isn't voluntary. Will they show?

title: Source: Packers to release star CB Alexander
content: The Packers plan to release two-time Pro Bowl cornerback Jaire Alexander, a source told ESPN, after the sides couldn't come to an agreement on a revised contract.

title: Judge homers off Red Sox rookie after jab at Yanks
content: Aaron Judge hit one of his two home runs Sunday night off Red Sox rookie Hunter Dobbins, whose recent comment that he'd rather retire than play for New York made waves. As Judge said, "I've only heard Ken Griffey say that, so I was a little surprised."

title: SGA's MVP performance lifts OKC to Game 2 win
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 34 points in a decisive Game 2 victory, bringing his total over his first two Finals games to an NBA-record 72 points.

title: Sources: RB Chubb expected to sign with Texans
content: Four-time Pro Bowl running back Nick Chubb is expected to sign a one-year deal with the Texans on Monday, sources told ESPN.

title: Inaugural Vitale event to feature Duke vs. Texas
content: ESPN and the Charlotte Sports Foundation have announced an annual men's college basketball event to honor Hall of Fame broadcaster Dick Vitale. The inaugural game, featuring the Texas Longhorns and Duke Blue Devils, will take place on Nov. 4.

title: Rays' Franco charged with gun possession in D.R.
content: Rays shortstop Wander Franco, who's on trial on charges that include sexual abuse of a minor, was charged Sunday with illegal possession of a handgun.

title: Sources: Tottenham hope to hire Frank as coach
content: Tottenham Hotspur are increasingly hopeful of appointing Thomas Frank as their new head coach, sources have told ESPN.

title: 2025 NBA Finals: NBA experts debate Thunder-Pacers Game 3 storylines, what's next
content: The Thunder evened the series on Sunday with a win over the Pacers. Here's what to watch heading into Game 3.

title: Still-too-early MLB All-Stars: AL, NL roster predictions and biggest debates
content: Freddie Freeman vs. Pete Alonso? Tarik Skubal vs. Kris Bubic? Here's our one-month-out look at who will make it to Atlanta.

title: U.S. Open tiers: Ranking every player from favorites to hopefuls
content: Can anyone stop Scottie Scheffler? Will Rory McIlroy find his game? We break down the U.S. Open field at Oakmont from the clear favorites all the way to the players looking to make the cut.

title: Inside the numbers: Where Connor McDavid, Leon Draisaitl rank as an all-time playoff duo
content: Edmonton's superstars are climbing the record books this postseason, passing legends on a near-nightly basis.

title: Dan Mullen wants to win in style at UNLV
content: After spending a few years on TV, the coach is back at the helm of a college program and looking to make a statement.

title: The Big Two? This Alcaraz-Sinner rivalry is epic
content: Sinner and Alcaraz have combined to win the last six Grand Slams -- and are pushing each other to new heights in the sport.

title: NCAA athlete pay: Here's what's next
content: Schools will begin directly paying their athletes in less than a month, thanks to a legal settlement that was officially approved in federal court Friday. However, the situation is far from settled.

title: Who won the men's transfer portal? Let's rank the 13 best teams
content: These teams got the best players from the transfer portal -- with some familiar faces in the mix for top spot.

title: UFC 316 clears the way for much-anticipated bantamweight showdowns
content: Two blockbuster fights seem imminent for the UFC 316 main card winners, while next steps for the losers are murkier.

title: Waiver wire: A pair of Blue Jays deserve your attention
content: Tristan H. Cockcroft outlines who should be claimed off the waiver wire and who should be dropped from fantasy rosters.

title: Transfer trends: Portugal-to-Prem pipeline, Italy is Europe's retirement home
content: Diving into 2,000 transfers, ESPN's Bill Connelly identifies the good, the bad and the ugly market trends since 2015.

title: Portugal's impressive Nations League win over Spain outshines Ronaldo vs. Yamal
content: Portugal's collective quality won the day -- and the headlines -- over Spain's impressive young talent.

title: Ronaldo to stay at Al Nassr? 'Nothing will change'
content: Cristiano Ronaldo has ended speculation regarding his future by confirming he will remain at Al Nassr.

title: Spectator dies at Nations League final after fall
content: UEFA has confirmed the death of a spectator during Portugal's Nations League final win against Spain in Munich on Sunday.

title: Sources: Chelsea eye Gittens deal, 1st bid rejected
content: Chelsea are continuing to pursue a deal for Jamie Gittens despite Borussia Dortmund holding out for a fee in the region of £40 million ($54.3m), sources have told ESPN.

title: Alonso starts work as Madrid step up CWC prep
content: Xabi Alonso completed his first training session as manager of Real Madrid on Monday after being reminded by Florentino Perez of the importance of the Club World Cup.

title: Tearful Ronaldo says 'duty done' after 2nd NL win
content: Portugal skipper Cristiano Ronaldo shed tears of joy as they won their second Nations League title on Sunday, insisting that winning trophies with his country beats all club honors.

title: Tuchel says he won't 'sugarcoat' England criticism
content: Thomas Tuchel has warned his England squad he won't "sugarcoat" his assessment of performances after criticising aspects of the win over Andorra.

title: MLS, players still at odds on CWC compensation
content: The discussions between MLS and the MLS Players Association over the Club World Cup prize money and player compensation remain ongoing, with the two sides failing to agree so far on terms in a newly revised section of the CBA.

title: Trailblazing Prem ref Uriah Rennie dies aged 65
content: Uriah Rennie, the first Black referee in the Premier League, has died aged 65, the Sheffield and Hallamshire County Football Association said on Sunday.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal plan fresh talks over €100m Sesko deal
content: Arsenal have scheduled another round of talks over signing RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla’s mission to International Space Station postponed once again
content: Once docked, the Ax-4 astronauts will spend about 14 days aboard the space station conducting microgravity research, technology demonstrations, and outreach events

title: Students without UID not be counted in sixth working day headcount
content: A student without a UID could be enrolled in some other school and this could lead to counting the student twice while determining headcount to determine the number of staff positions in an academic year.

title: Delhi High Court seeks reply over constitution of 15th Press Council
content: The Mumbai Press Club filed a petition stating that the term of the 14th Press Council ended on October 8, 2024 but the new Press Council had not been constituted yet even as it has been eight months

title: MEIL’s sub-contract to Bauer Group to construct Polavaram project diaphragm wall done with CWC approval: Minister
content: The diaphragm wall is being built after it collapsed during the Godavari floods in 2021, as recommended by the experts and the CWS

title: LDF, UDF continue blame game over boy’s tragic death
content: LDF stages a protest outside Vazhikkadavu panchayat office, while UDF organises a march to the Kerala State Electricity Board office, each trying to pin the responsibility on the other

title: Kottayam’s high-ranges to get automated landslide warning system
content: Project proposes to develop an integrated landslide early warning system using electrical, electronic, fiber-optic, and weather sensors, as well as mathematical models

title: Govt. working to turn A.P. into knowledge hub, says Revenue Minister
content: Angani Satya Prasad says government is working to bring changes in the curriculum from KG to PG and credits Minister for Education N. Lokesh of trying to put the education system back on track in the State

title: Congress challenges Centre to present development record on global indices
content: Harshvardhan Sapkal questions Modi government’s performance over 11 years, cites gaps in job creation, farmer welfare

title: Steps being taken to increase milk production in T.N.: Minister
content: Mano Thangaraj and Siva V. Meyyanathan unveiled the foundation for construction of a milk chilling plant at a cost of ₹24 lakh at Kottaikaadu panchayat in Karambakudi panchayat union

title: Five Left parties appeal to PM Modi to stop ‘extra-judicial killings’ in Chhattisgarh
content: Under Operation Kagar, the Left parties urged the government to respond to the Maoist declaration of unilateral ceasefire and initiate a dialogue to resolve all issues

title: Temporary solution to supply crisis at SCTIMST
content: Institute enters into an interim agreement with HLL Lifecare Ltd. which will procure and supply the required high-end cath lab materials. The supply shortage had had resulted in a total halt to all neuro interventional procedures in the institute

title: State looks for insurance compensation in ship accident case
content: State government is of the view that there is no need to file an immediate criminal case against shipping company in connection with the ship accident. Government is looking for adequate insurance compensation through negotiation. A decision in this regard was taken at a meeting between Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and Director General of Shipping recently

title: 240 ITI students participate in skill training initiative for job opportunities abroad
content: Through language and cultural training, the initiative launched by APSSDC, empowers India’s skilled and semi-skilled workforce to succeed internationally, particularly in Germany

title: Rationalisation of polling booths with over 1,200 voters to enhance accessibility
content: Chief Electoral Officer says training of officials in election laws, IT and other aspects is mandatory

title: For trapped predator and prey, instinct to survive overrules impluse to hunt: experts
content: Tiger and dog stuck in pit for hours, tiger released into Periyar Tiger Reserve after shared survival experience.

title: A.P.’s Quantum Valley should have a distinct identity like Silicon Valley, CM tells officials
content: Quantum Mission is being implemented in two phases with an investment of ₹4,000 crore, says Chandrababu Naidu

title: Naidu inaugurates Vision Action Plan Units in 26 districts, 175 constituencies in A.P.
content: Event marks a formal launch of ‘Swarna Andhra 2047’ vision, each unit will have a team of nine members, and ₹10 lakh has been allocated per office for its operations, says Chief Minister

title: Modi government weakened autonomy of constitutional institutions in past 11 years: Congress
content: The Congress chief accused the Modi government of “stealing people’s mandate, toppling governments through the back door, imposing one-party dictatorship and weakening the federal structure”

title: Small Plane Carrying 6 Crashes In Pacific Ocean Off San Diego In US
content: The US Coast Guard and other agencies are searching Monday for six people that were onboard a twin-engine Cessna 414 that crashed in the Pacific Ocean three miles west of San Diego.

title: Why Trump Appears To Have Won Billionaire Battle Royale With Elon Musk
content: A "Big Beautiful Bill" drove a wedge between US President Donald Trump and his former adviser Elon Musk, turning the bros to, well, almost foes.

title: Godrej's Tanya Dubash-Promoted Realty Firm Buys Mumbai Flat For Rs 226 Crore
content: Private real estate firm Shaula Real Estates, where the daughter of Godrej Industries Chairman Adi Godrej is a director, has purchased a duplex apartment at Worli for nearly Rs 226 crore.

title: Ayodhya Land Prices Soar As Circle Rates Hiked Up To 200 Per Cent
content: After eight years, the circle rates of Ayodhya have been revised upward, with an increase ranging from 30 per cent to 200 per cent, depending on location and land use.

title: 'Derogatory' Remarks Against Amaravati: Journalist Who Hosted Show Arrested
content: Senior Telugu journalist Kommineni Srinivas Rao was arrested in Hyderabad for hosting a programme on a vernacular channel where a scribe allegedly made derogatory remarks against Amaravati.

title: "Unless She Confesses": Victim's Brother On Honeymoon Murder Accused
content: Vipin Raghuvanshi, brother of the man from Indore who was allegedly killed by his wife during the honeymoon in Meghalaya, indicated that he had trouble believing that Sonam Raghuvanshi had a boyfriend and that she is responsible for the murder.

title: Third Kill In 2 Months, Tiger Attacks Temple Caretaker In Ranthambore
content: A 60-year-old man was killed in a tiger attack in Rajasthan's Ranthambore tiger reserve on Monday, the third such death in less than two months.

title: Axiom-4 Mission Launch To Space Postponed By A Day Due To Bad Weather
content: Axiom-4 mission launch for sending India's Shubhanshu Shukla to space postponed by a day due to bad weather

title: Aiming For The Sky: When Shubhanshu Shukla Ran Away From Sister's 'Vidaai'
content: India's Cosmic Leap: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla will make history by becoming the second Indian to fly to space since 1984.

title: CBI Arrests Man For Child Sexual Abuse, Uploading Video On Internet
content: The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) on Monday arrested Lalrampana, a resident of Aizawl, Mizoram, in a case involving the sexual assault of a minor and the possession and circulation of Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM).

title: Starlink Device May Cost Rs 33,000 In India, Monthly Plan Charges Likely At Rs 3,000
content: Elon Musk's satellite internet service Starlink is preparing to commence operations in India within the next two months after receiving its license last week, sources said.

title: Real-Feel Temperature Shoots To 49 Degrees Celsius In Delhi, Orange Alert Issued
content: Delhi baked in extreme heat as the real-feel temperature shot up to a scorching 48.9 degrees Celsius, with the IMD issuing an orange alert for the next two days.

title: "Breach Of Principles...": Bombay High Court On Pune Student's Explusion Over Instagram Post On Op Sindoor
content: The Bombay High Court on Monday set aside the expulsion of a 19-year-old second-year engineering student from Sinhgad Academy of Engineering, Pune, who was arrested for an Instagram post related to Operation Sindoor.

title: NDTV Impact: Ghost Employee Alert Triggers Statewide Audit in Madhya Pradesh
content: After an explosive report by NDTV on the possibility of thousands of "ghost employees" in Madhya Pradesh, based on a letter from the state treasury, the government has finally responded with an extensive data cleansing drive.

title: Sonia Gandhi Visits Delhi Hospital, Days After High Blood Pressure Complaint: Sources
content: Congress leader Sonia Gandhi visited Sir Ganga Ram Hospital (SGRH) and underwent a medical check-up, sources said.

title: Minor Sexually Harassed, Political Parties Express Concern Over Women Safety
content: A 13-year-old inmate of a government home near Chennai was sexually harassed by a security staff of the institution and has been arrested by the police.

title: "Had Good Nature, Don't Think She Did This": Sonam Raghuvanshi's Neighbours
content: The neighbour of Sonam Raghuvanshi, an accused in the Indore couple case could not believe that she could be involved in these kinds of criminal activities.

title: "Indian Roads Will Be Similar To That Of America In 2 Years": Minister Nitin Gadkari
content: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari asserted on Monday that Indian road infrastructure will be comparable to America's in another two years, backing his argument that his government has ramped up spending on roads and highways over the past decade.

title: Lilavati Trust Seeks Removal Of HDFC Bank CEO, Bank Responds
content: Lilavati Trust has called for the immediate suspension and prosecution of Managing Director and CEO of HDFC Bank, Sashidhar Jagdishan.

title: Air India shores up revenue to record level, cuts losses
content: Full-service carrier Air India clocked a profit, excluding exceptional items, in the second half of FY2025

title: Red, orange alert sounded in Dharwad for the next three days
content: IMD has forecast heavy to moderate rain, according to Deputy Commissioner and chairperson of District Disaster Management Authority

title: Value-based journalism is need of the hour, says A.P. Media Academy chairman
content: Alapati Suresh Kumar expresses the view that problems would not crop up if everyone in journalism adhered to ethical values

title: Kerala shipwreck: Plastic pellets from sunken Liberian vessel found in Rameswaram coast
content: Police sources believe that the bags must have been washed ashore from the Liberian container ship MSC Elsa 3, that sank off Kochi coast in Kerala on May 25.

title: Mother and daughter shot dead in Patna, husband critically injured
content: Three unidentified assailants open fire inside house in Arfabad Colony; police probe underway with CCTV footage under examination

title: Double lung transplant performed at Rela Hospital averts imminent heart failure in mother of two
content: Interstitial lung disease is a growing concern in India, especially among women with autoimmune conditions. Yet, awareness about lung transplantation as a treatment option remains low

title: HCLTech opens delivery centre at Technopark
content: This is the second unit to be set up in Kerala in seven months of the opening of its Infopark unit in Kochi

title: Sanjay Raut slams Election Commission, asks if BJP has ‘contract’ to defend poll body
content: The Shiv Sena (UBT) leader’s remarks came a day after Maharashtra CM Fadnavis penned a newspaper article refuting Rahul Gandhi’s claims of “match-fixing” and “rigging” in 2024 Maharashtra Assembly polls

title: Controversy erupts over decision to hold repeat exams before declaration of results
content: Teachers from polytechnic colleges across the State have raised serious concerns over the move, calling it “unprecedented”

title: Families of stampede victims receive compensation as they mourn their loved ones
content: Many fans now demand that the RCB management, which also announced compensation of ₹10 lakh per victim should increase it, and players should also volunteer to help the families of the victims

title: Trinamool State leadership complains to EC against Anvar
content: Leadership objects to Independent candidate P.V. Anvar’s unauthorised use of party’s name, flags, symbols, and national leaders’ images in the Nilambur Assembly byelection

title: Congress releases BJP's '11 year' report card, flags rising hunger, inequality
content: The booklet, 'Ek Aur Baar Jumla Sarkar', Rajeev Gowda said, looks at the promises made by the BJP in its 2024 manifesto, and has since made.

title: Rapido expands its services to 14 cities/towns in A.P.
content: The list includes Ongole, Vizianagaram, Eluru, Chittoor, Madanapalle, Machilipatnam, Srikakulam, Bhimavaram, Gudivada, Narasaraopet, Nandyal, Tenali, Tadipatri and Tadepalligudem

title: Scheduled Caste residents in Tamil Nadu’s Tiruvarur village ostracised from temple festival, management; stage protest
content: For over five years, members of the Scheduled Castes had sought a representation in the management of the village temple, which, they say, serves the entire village

title: Underwater salvage operation of container ship that sank off Alappuzha coast begins: DGS
content: Ship’s owner firm Mediterranean Shipping Company ropes in Singapore-based T&T Salvage for the task. The salvage team has mobilised diving support vessel SEAMEC III and 12 divers will carry out air-diving operation

title: State will neither forgive nor forget ‘anti-Tamil Nadu policies’ of BJP: TNCC president Selvaperunthagai
content: ‘What better proof is needed of the government’s betrayal than the fact that it had allocated only ₹24 crore over three years for Classical Tamil, while granting ₹664 crore for Sanskrit, a language spoken by only 24,000 people?’

title: Tracking down the missing phones of Sabarimala pilgrims
content: The Cyber Help Desk of the Pampa police station has tracked and recovered 102 phones reported missing at the pilgrim site and returned them to their owners

title: Protests erupt over ‘derogatory remarks’ against Amaravati women
content: Telugu Mahila activists stage protest outside TV channel office in Guntur demanding unconditional apology from management; Dy. Speaker says panellists have failed to uphold media ethics; MLA calls it deliberate attempt to insult women who did not support YSRCP in the polls

title: Railways reports spike in cases of vehicles damaging boom barriers at level-crossings
content: Over 100 cases of vehicles hitting boom barriers causing damage had been reported in the last 17 months within the Tiruchi Railway Division, which maintains 493 level-crossing gates in 10 districts

title: Charred body identified; victim’s live-in partner and his associate arrested
content: The District Police on Monday resolved the case reported from the outskirts of Ladlapur village in Chittapur taluk of Kalaburagi district

title: Naidu congratulates Rakesh Kalapala on being appointed associate editor of ASGE journal
content: Dr. Rakesh is currently the director of Endoscopy at the AIG Hospital’s Centre for Obesity and Metabolic Therapy in Hyderabad

title: Residential hostel contract workers plan protest on Friday
content: They say that a blacklisted manpower agency is operating in Kalaburagi but the district in-charge Minister has failed to act despite reminders

title: No return tickets, sudden plan change: Kin of murdered honeymooner share shocking details
content: The murder of Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi in Meghalaya has taken a shocking turn as his mother reveals he was hesitant about the honeymoon. Sonam, his wife, planned the trip but didn't book return tickets, raising suspicions. The family suspects Sonam and her alleged lover, Raj Kushwaha, were involved, especially after Sonam's sudden surrender and the discovery that Raja was carrying valuable jewelry.

title: Launch of Axiom-4 mission to International Space Station delayed
content: ISRO announced the postponement of the Axiom-4 mission launch to the International Space Station (ISS) by a day, now scheduled for June 11. The decision to delay the Isro-Nasa joint mission, which includes sending an Indian Gaganyatri, was attributed to unfavorable weather conditions. The launch is now targeted for 5:30 PM IST on June 11, according to ISRO chairperson Dr.

title: LA riots: American strongman sends troops to quell protests in oppn-ruled California
content: ​Mr Trump – known for strongman-like tendencies like Mr Putin and Mr Jinping – sent in over 2,000 National Guard troops, dressed like Stormtroopers, to quell a popular uprising sparked by workplace raids on labourers who Mr Trump’s officials claim are “illegals” working in America without papers. It was, as one expert put it, a prime example of authoritarian overreach that has become a feature of American autocracy since Mr Trump’s white nationalist Republican Party came to power in the last election.

title: B'luru stampede: Suspended ACP challenges K'taka govt order; moves CAT
content: Senior IPS officer Vikash Kumar Vikash, suspended after a stampede outside Bengaluru's Chinnaswamy Stadium that resulted in 11 fatalities, has challenged his suspension before the Central Administrative Tribunal. The stampede occurred during an event celebrating Royal Challengers Bengaluru's IPL victory, despite police concerns regarding inadequate preparation time. Karnataka's Chief Minister defended the suspensions, citing dereliction of duty.

title: US plane crash: Small aircraft carrying 6 passengers crashes in San Diego
content: A Cessna 414 carrying six individuals crashed into the Pacific Ocean near San Diego shortly after takeoff on Sunday. The US Coast Guard and San Diego Fire-Rescue responded to the incident, locating a debris field off Point Loma in waters approximately 200 feet deep. The plane, en route to Phoenix, went down around 12:30 pm.

title: Steve Jobs tip to Apple CEO Tim Cook: Never to stay 'married' to my past ...; a skill Cook says he learnt late
content: Tim Cook credits Steve Jobs with teaching him the invaluable skill of rapidly changing his mind when presented with new evidence, a trait powered by emotional intelligence. Jobs's ability to shift direction and let go of pride influenced Cook and many others, including Jeff Bezos, Jony Ive, and Marc Benioff.

title: Explained: How Modi govt pulled 270m out of poverty - what’s the road ahead?
content: The number of people living in extreme poverty in India has dipped to 75.24 million in FY 2022-23 from 344.47 million in FY 2011-12. Incidentally, India’s huge reduction in extreme poverty comes at a time when globally there has been an increase in the number of people below the poverty line.

title: ‘Two maces would be special, but 2023 World Cup tops it’ – Pat Cummins reflects on his legacy
content: Australian captain Pat Cummins regards the 2023 ODI World Cup victory over India as a career highlight. Aiming for consecutive World Test Championship (WTC) titles, Cummins emphasizes the team's consistent performance across diverse conditions.

title: Tesla Optimus chief resigns: Thanks Elon Musk in his farewell post on Twitter; says ‘You have …'
content: Milan Kovac, Tesla's Optimus robot project head, has resigned to spend more time with family abroad after nine years with the company. This transition occurs as Tesla intensifies its focus on autonomous technology and robotics. Ashok Elluswamy, currently leading Tesla’s Autopilot team, will assume Kovac’s responsibilities amidst challenges like rare-earth magnet export restrictions.

title: Meghalaya murder case: Autopsy report reveals how Raja Raghuvanshi was killed
content: Raja Raghuvanshi was murdered during his honeymoon in Meghalaya, with the autopsy revealing he died from sharp weapon injuries. His wife, Sonam, and three accomplices have been arrested after confessing to a murder-for-hire plot. The investigation is ongoing, with police recovering a machete and pursuing further leads in the case.

title: 'Free of cost': EC counters Rahul Gandhi's voter roll demand on Maha polls
content: Following Rahul Gandhi's repeated attacks, the Election Commission (EC) has advised him to download Maharashtra voter rolls from its website for free. The EC maintains it shares details with recognized parties and refuted Gandhi's allegations of "match-fixing" in the electoral process, calling them absurd.

title: Mumbai train tragedy: Railways to redesign coaches; what are the new features?
content: Following a tragic train accident in Maharashtra, the Railway Minister and railway board officials are implementing significant design changes for new non-AC trains. These modifications include louvred doors, roof-mounted ventilation, and vestibules to improve ventilation and passenger movement. The first redesigned train is expected to be ready by November 2025 and operational by January 2026 after testing.

title: 11 years of PM Modi: BJP chief hails shift from ‘politics of appeasement’ to 'performance'
content: BJP President JP Nadda asserted that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's 11 years in power have transformed Indian politics, shifting the focus from appeasement to performance and accountability. He highlighted the government's inclusive development approach, outreach to marginalized communities, and bold decisions like abolishing Triple Talaq. Nadda also emphasized India's economic progress and proactive governance during crises like the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Honeymoon horror: Meghalaya Police takes custody of Sonam Raghuvanshi in UP
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi, accused of plotting her husband's murder during their honeymoon, has been taken into custody by Meghalaya police from Uttar Pradesh. Three individuals have already been arrested, confessing to being hired by Sonam to kill Raja. The autopsy revealed Raja died from injuries inflicted by a sharp weapon, with a machete recovered nearby.

title: 'Stabbed her 13 times': B'luru techie kills lover, mother of 2 at hotel; arrested
content: In Bengaluru, Harini R, a 33-year-old woman, was found murdered in a hotel room. Police have arrested Yashas, 25, her alleged lover, in connection with the crime. Harini, married with two children, had been in an extramarital affair with Yashas. The murder occurred after Harini told Yashas she could no longer continue the relationship.

title: ITR filing: Got a notice? Top types of tax notices & actions required
content: As the ITR filing season for FY 2024-25 begins, understanding potential Income Tax Department notices is crucial. Ignoring deadlines or inaccuracies in 26AS & AIS can lead to penalties. Prompt action, accurate documentation, and expert consultation when needed are essential for a stress-free compliance.

title: Honeymoon murder twist: 'Sonam suddenly surfaced', say cops; reveal details of arrested 'hitmen'
content: Meghalaya Police clarified that Sonam Raghuvanshi voluntarily surrendered at Nandganj Police Station in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, in connection with the honeymoon murder case. She is currently under the safe custody of the Uttar Pradesh Police, and legal procedures are being followed for her transit and formal statement, as confirmed by Deputy CM Prestone Tynsong.

title: 'They’re here for a reason' - Steve Smith on why South Africa can’t be taken lightly
content: Steve Smith anticipates a challenging contest against South Africa's formidable pace attack, spearheaded by Kagiso Rabada and Marco Jansen, in the World Test Championship final at Lord's. Despite Australia being favorites, Smith acknowledges the Proteas' strength. He also reflects on his own successful record at Lord's, while noting the unique challenges the ground presents.

title: LA riots: Newsom blames Trump admin for inciting violence
content: California Governor Gavin Newsom has condemned the Trump administration's deployment of 2,000 National Guard troops to Los Angeles, accusing them of escalating tensions amid immigration protests. Newsom asserts that Trump is manufacturing a crisis, while the administration claims local authorities have lost control.

title: Honeymoon horror: 'Wife hired killers', say cops; 'Sonam innocent,' claims family
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi's father claims her innocence after she was arrested for allegedly hiring people to kill her husband during their honeymoon in Meghalaya. He accuses the Meghalaya Police of fabricating the story and plans to request a CBI inquiry.

title: Veteran Brad Marchand might end Toronto Maple Leafs' playoff dilemma—but at what cost?
content: Brad Marchand, a veteran player, may become a free agent. The Toronto Maple Leafs are considering signing him. Marchand has a history of playoff success. He also expressed support for the Leafs in his childhood. The Leafs must weigh Marchand's potential impact against his age and contract demands. The team needs to decide if he is worth the risk.

title: Honeymoon horror: Sonam's brother reveals what he did after her phone call
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi faced arrest in connection with her husband's murder. The arrest occurred on the Varanasi-Ghazipur highway. She allegedly planned the crime during their honeymoon in Meghalaya. Three men were also arrested. They confessed to being hired by Sonam. Raja's body was discovered in a gorge. The family insists on Sonam's innocence.

title: Watch: Handcuffed Indian student in US pinned to ground, deported
content: A video showing an Indian student being handcuffed and deported from Newark Airport in the US has sparked outrage. Social entrepreneur Kunal Jain witnessed the incident, where the student was treated like a criminal and appeared disoriented. Jain is seeking assistance from the Indian Embassy and External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, highlighting concerns about the increasing number of similar deportations.

title: 'Good first step': Rahul on EC move to release Maha rolls; seeks 'exact date'
content: Rahul Gandhi has urged the Election Commission to specify the date for providing voter rolls from the Maharashtra and Haryana legislative elections, welcoming the decision to share electoral data from 2009-2024.

title: 'Kagiso Rabada will be a massive threat' - SA players ahead of Aus clash
content: Ahead of the World Test Championship final against Australia, South African players are showering praise on Kagiso Rabada, with many calling him the "best bowler in the world." Kyle Verreynne highlighted Rabada's ability to rise to the occasion on the big stage. David Bedingham emphasized Rabada's past success at Lord's and his leadership role.

title: Honeymoon horror: Sonam's 'lover' worked in brother's firm; cops probe murder
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi, wife of Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi, has been arrested in Uttar Pradesh for allegedly orchestrating her husband's murder during their Meghalaya honeymoon. Police claim she conspired with her lover and hired killers. Three men have also been arrested, confessing to the crime. Sonam's father insists on her innocence and demands a CBI probe.

title: Watch: Oz reporter hit by rubber bullet while covering LA riots
content: While reporting live on anti-immigration protests in Los Angeles, 9News US correspondent Lauren Tomasi was struck in the leg by a rubber bullet fired by an LAPD officer. The incident, captured on camera, occurred as police moved in on horseback to disperse protesters.

title: Taylor Swift leans on Travis Kelce as she distances herself from Blake Lively legal drama
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce, despite recent public appearances, navigate the shadow of the Blake Lively-Justin Baldoni legal situation. Sources reveal Kelce is Swift's support system amidst the drama, influencing their preference for Florida's privacy over New York. The couple briefly halted joint appearances post-Super Bowl LIX due to heightened attention.

title: Security topmost: Starlink may have to share data with India amid safety concerns
content: Elon Musk's Starlink faces new regulations in India, compelling it to share user data, including details of seized satellite kits, particularly from the North-East region. This follows security concerns about unauthorized Starlink device usage in border areas. The Indian government's directive comes after Starlink previously resisted sharing such information, prompting investigations and potential penalties for non-compliance.

title: RJ Karishma talks about characters, content, and creativity: Exclusive
content: Karishma Gangwal, or RJ Karishma, is a popular content creator. She transitioned from radio jockey to digital content creator. Her relatable characters have garnered appreciation. Karishma debuted in OTT with 'Bright Bhavishya Loading'. She draws inspiration from real people and her family's comedic nature. She admires actors like Shefali Shah, Gajraj Rao, and Neena Gupta. They inspire her to break stereotypes. She is grateful for her team and the opportunity to pursue her passion.

title: Shreyas Iyer on captaincy pressure: 'You are always expected to perform'
content: Shreyas Iyer's captaincy has propelled Sobo Mumbai Falcons into the semi-finals of the Mumbai T20 League 2025. The 30-year-old has balanced youth and experience, leading the team to four wins in five matches. Iyer emphasized the league's role in nurturing young talent, providing a platform beyond club cricket.

title: French Open 2025: How Alcaraz and Sinner gave us a glimpse of the future
content: ​They had watched the greats. Now they are channelling them. Novak Djokovic once said he saw in Alcaraz a mix of himself, Federer and Nadal. John McEnroe called Sinner “the most improved player on the planet.” On June 8, both men made the prophecy real. Like Seeger watching Dylan, we got a glimpse of the future. And it is going to be glorious. And even if it isn’t like Rick and Ilsa in Casablanca: We will always have Paris.

title: Ex-England captain's big statement on Shubman Gill
content: Following Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's retirements, Shubman Gill, 25, has been named India's Test captain, a move Michael Vaughan considers bold. Gill will lead India in the upcoming five-match series against England, marking the start of the WTC 2025-27 cycle. Vaughan believes this tour could usher in a new era for Indian Test cricket, with Rishabh Pant as vice-captain.

title: “Save the Chiefs”: New York puts Chiefs name on chopping block
content: A New York state ruling against Native American team names faces strong opposition in Massapequa. Residents are defending their high school's 'Chiefs' mascot. They launched a public campaign. Figures like Donald Trump and Linda McMahon are backing them. They are challenging the ban's legality and financial impact. The New York Department of Education might extend the ban.

title: 'Stay inside': China issues advisory for its citizens as LA riots rage
content: Amidst escalating unrest in Los Angeles due to immigration protests, China has cautioned its citizens to exercise vigilance and prioritize their safety. The advisory includes avoiding gatherings, crowded areas, and nighttime outings. This follows President Trump's deployment of National Guard troops and criticism of local officials' handling of the situation, with numerous arrests already made during demonstrations.

title: MCX silver hits record high of Rs 1.06 lakh; is Rs 1.2 lakh next milestone?
content: Silver is surging in 2025, hitting record highs due to safe-haven demand, supply constraints, and strong industrial use in clean energy and electronics. Experts predict the rally will continue, potentially reaching Rs 1,23,000/kg, driven by geopolitical tensions and a shift towards green technologies. Analysts advise a buy-on-dips strategy, citing positive technical signals and long-term supply issues.

title: “Until we got married”: Kansas City Chief Patrick Mahomes on wife Brittany's support
content: Kansas City Chiefs' star quarterback Patrick Mahomes recently lauded his wife, Brittany, for her unwavering support since their high school days. He credited her for helping him evolve, both on and off the field. Mahomes highlighted Brittany's constant presence and influence, acknowledging her pivotal role in his personal and professional growth.

title: Watch: Fire breaks out on ship off Kerala coast; 18 crew abandon burning container
content: A fire erupted on the Singapore-flagged container ship MV Wan Hai 503 off the Kerala coast, prompting a swift response from the Indian Navy. Four crew members are missing, and five are injured following the underdeck fire, which was reported on Monday morning. INS Surat has been diverted to assist, and a Dornier aircraft will assess the situation.

title: These 3 uncapped stars will 'definitely' make India's WC squad
content: Robin Uthappa believes young talents Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, and Vaibhav Suryavanshi are strong contenders for India's T20 World Cup squad. Their explosive IPL performances have created a selection dilemma, with Shubman Gill, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Abhishek Sharma and Sanju Samson also in contention. Uthappa emphasizes using remaining T20s to finalize the best 15, prioritizing fitness alongside form.

title: India tour of England: Pujara and Nehra reveal key to success
content: As India embarks on a new era in Test cricket under Shubman Gill's captaincy, former cricketers emphasize the importance of adapting to English conditions for a successful tour. With veterans like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli retired, Cheteshwar Pujara urges every player to contribute.

title: Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner: Behind romance of NHL legend and his girlfriend
content: NHL icon Sidney Crosby's stellar hockey career is complemented by his enduring, private relationship with Kathy Leutner. Dating since 2008 after meeting through mutual friends, Crosby and Leutner have maintained a low-profile romance amidst fame. Leutner, a former model for brands like Abercrombie & Fitch, supports Crosby from the sidelines, showcasing a bond that prioritizes substance over public attention.

title: Chambal's haunted ravines: Secret shooting range found; become training hub for gangs
content: The Chambal ravines, once hideouts for bandits, are now training grounds for organized crime, as revealed by the arrest of gangster Jeetu Chambal. He operated a makeshift shooting range used by interstate gangs, including those linked to Lawrence Bishnoi and Anandpal Singh, to train sharpshooters.

title: 'Thug Life' BO collection day 5: Kamal Haasan starrer slows down after weekend surge
content: Kamal Haasan's 'Thug Life,' directed by Mani Ratnam, opened strongly with ₹15.5 crore but faced mixed reviews regarding pacing and screenplay. Collections sharply declined after the first day, with a slight weekend recovery before a significant drop on Day 5. The film's five-day total stands at ₹38.03 crore, with its future success dependent on wider audience appeal.

title: 'Falsely implicated': RCB moves HC to quash criminal case in B'luru stampede
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru has petitioned the Karnataka High Court to dismiss a criminal case related to the June 4 stampede outside Chinnaswamy Stadium, which resulted in 11 deaths. The tragedy occurred amidst celebrations for RCB's anticipated IPL victory. Karnataka's Chief Minister Siddaramaiah expressed sorrow, suspended police officers, and initiated an investigation into the incident.

title: 'Automatic door closer': Railways take major decision after many fall from Mumbai train
content: Following a tragic incident where passengers fell from an overcrowded local train, Indian Railways has mandated automatic door-closing mechanisms for all new rakes manufactured for Mumbai's suburban network. Existing rakes will also be redesigned to include this safety feature. This decision aims to prevent accidents caused by open doors and improve passenger safety on Mumbai's busy local trains.

title: Racket Rafael Nadal used to win 2017 French Open sells for $157,333
content: a racket used by Rafael Nadal during his 2017 French Open final sold at a Prestige Memorabilia auction for $157,333.20 including buyer's premium on Sunday . the previous record was a Racket he used during the 2022 Australian Open . in 2017, he defeated Stan Wawrinka in straight sets, 6-2, 6-3, 6-1, for his record-extending 10th french Open title .

title: SGA leads Thunder to Game 2 bounce-back

title: From QB battles to rookie progress, here's everything we're watching at minicamps
content: the second week of NFL minicamps kicks off with 30 teams gathering for workouts after the Detroit Lions canceled their sessions . it's a chance to see who shows up after skipping voluntary workouts, how rookies perform against veterans, and how offensive and defensive systems look under new coordinators . the team has insisted that Cook will be playing for the Bills this season .

title: Sources: Man City set to add French star Cherki
